General.Name: Tibet Summit Resources Co Ltd
General.Description: Tibet Summit Resources Co.,Ltd. develops and produces non-ferrous metal mineral resources in China. The company engages in mining, dressing, smelting, and production of lead-zinc polymetallic mines. It also offers crude lead, zinc, silver, and copper concentrate powder. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Shanghai, China.

3.Name: Mr. Handong  Hu
3.Title: VP & Sec. of the Board of Directors
